conducted. Several reported challenges in implementation have occurred, as the main 
activity remains training of health care workers without significant expansion to community-
based practices. 
Child Health Days (CHDs) were implemented in Tanzania beginning in 2000. Coverage 
for each component of CHDs has been reported as follows: measles immunization, 97%
